thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com | 4 of 108
thread.title: Donna Karmel

author: Donna Karmel
title: Donna Karmel
text: I have found that Topcashback often lives up to its name and offers the highest cashback available from sites where I like to shop. When it offers the same cashback as other sites, I still choose Topcashback because when I get my payout, instead of cash back, I choose the option of the American Express reward card since it pays an extra 6% over my earnings. Other cashback sites I like don't have that option.
